greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n divided by largest 4th-power-free factor of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^max(e-3, 0). - _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 07 2020
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := p^Max[e-3, 0]; a[n_] := Times @@ (f @@@ FactorInteger[n]); Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 07 2020 *)
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 18 2001
